title: Trench coat man
creator_credit: Charles Skoutariotis, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Charles Skoutariotis talks about the events in his life, the little things, that led him to become the person he is. At school, they call him ‘Trench coat man’.
